Class LinkedBeans

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.bean.LinkedBeans

  • public class LinkedBeans
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for working with entity arrays.

      • getDirectReferencesTo

        public static <T extends KeyableBean> java.util.Collection<T> getDirectReferencesTo(KeyableBean target,
                                                                                    ILinkPropertyInfo foreignKey,
                                                                                    java.lang.Class<T> sourceType)
        Gets all beans connected to the target through the given foreign key (and source type), either in the DB or the bundle.
        Parameters:
        target - The target bean
        foreignKey - The foreign key
        sourceType - The source type (for casting)
        Returns:
        All beans that refer to the given bean through the FK

      • getDirectReferencesTo

        public static <T extends KeyableBean> java.util.Collection<T> getDirectReferencesTo(KeyableBean target,
                                                                                    java.lang.String fkName,
                                                                                    java.lang.Class<T> sourceType)
        Gets all beans connected to the target through the given foreign key (and source type), either in the DB or the bundle.
        Parameters:
        target - The target bean
        fkName - The name of the foreign key on the source type
        sourceType - The source type
        Returns:
        All beans that refer to the given bean through the FK

      • getOneToOneWithRetired

        public static <T extends KeyableBean> java.util.Collection<T> getOneToOneWithRetired(KeyableBean owner,
                                                                                     IOneToOnePropertyInfo oneToOneProp,
                                                                                     java.lang.Class<T> targetType)
        Finds the target of a one-to-one property regardless of whether or not it is retired. Note: if there are multiple linked beans, this method will return the only non-retired bean, or the first retired bean.
        Parameters:
        owner - The owner of the one-to-one property
        oneToOneProp - The property
        targetType - The target type
        Returns:
        The (potentially retired) target, or null

      • getOneToOneWithRetired

        public static <T extends KeyableBean> java.util.Collection<T> getOneToOneWithRetired(KeyableBean owner,
                                                                                     java.lang.String propName,
                                                                                     java.lang.Class<T> targetType)
        Finds the target of a one-to-one property regardless of whether or not it is retired. Note: if there are multiple linked beans, this method will return the only non-retired bean, or the first retired bean.
        Parameters:
        owner - The owner of the one-to-one property
        propName - The one-to-one property name
        targetType - The target type
        Returns:
        The (potentially retired) target, or null

      • getArrayWithRetired

        public static <T extends KeyableBean> java.util.Collection<T> getArrayWithRetired(KeyableBean owner,
                                                                                  java.lang.String arrayName,
                                                                                  java.lang.Class<T> targetType)
        Gets array beans for the given owner and array property, including retired.
        Parameters:
        owner - The owner of the property
        arrayName - The name of the array property
        targetType - The target type of the array
        Returns:
        The array beans
